column2: Buy a goat. Do it! Get on the ladder.
You thought you were done? You're not done yet!
Congratulations! You truely are a farmer of goats
It's just a firkin, what could it cost? 160,000 echoes?
AND SO SHALL YOU NEVER DIE
You can receive a new gift from Balmoral
You have received this week's gift from Balmoral
